actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize a study of the feasibility and desirability of establishing a Channel Islands National Park in the State of California.

summary.text: Authorizes a study by the Secretary of the Interior of the feasibility and desirability of establishing a Channel Islands National Park in the State of California. Authorizes such appropriations as necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a study of the feasibility and desirability of establishing a Channel Islands National Park in the State of California.
